comments.body: Nit: datastore update fails occasionally in cocoon, and we applied a [retry logic](https://devops-console-oss.corp.google.com/flutter/cocoon/+/master:app_dart/lib/src/service/datastore.dart;l=41?q=runTransactionWithRetries&ss=flutter). Leave this to you to add or not.

Since we haven't received any failure reports in the current Flutter engine benchmark bots since Jan 2020, and this legacy datastore handling code is eventually going to be deleted after the migration, I probably will leave it as is.
